speaker: YORK
text_entry: SCENE III. Field of battle betwixt Sandal Castle and Wakefield.

speaker: YORK
text_entry: Alarums. Enter RUTLAND and his Tutor

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Ah, whither shall I fly to 'scape their hands?

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Ah, tutor, look where bloody Clifford comes!

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Enter CLIFFORD and Soldiers

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Chaplain, away! thy priesthood saves thy life.

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: As for the brat of this accursed duke,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Whose father slew my father, he shall die.

speaker: Tutor
text_entry: And I, my lord, will bear him company.

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Soldiers, away with him!

speaker: Tutor
text_entry: Ah, Clifford, murder not this innocent child,

speaker: Tutor
text_entry: Lest thou be hated both of God and man!

speaker: Tutor
text_entry: Exit, dragged off by Soldiers

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: How now! is he dead already? or is it fear

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: That makes him close his eyes? I'll open them.

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: So looks the pent-up lion o'er the wretch

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: That trembles under his devouring paws;

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: And so he walks, insulting o'er his prey,

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: And so he comes, to rend his limbs asunder.

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Ah, gentle Clifford, kill me with thy sword,

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: And not with such a cruel threatening look.

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Sweet Clifford, hear me speak before I die.

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: I am too mean a subject for thy wrath:

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Be thou revenged on men, and let me live.

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: In vain thou speak'st, poor boy; my father's blood

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Hath stopp'd the passage where thy words should enter.

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Then let my father's blood open it again:

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: He is a man, and, Clifford, cope with him.

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Had thy brethren here, their lives and thine

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Were not revenge sufficient for me;

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: No, if I digg'd up thy forefathers' graves

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: And hung their rotten coffins up in chains,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: It could not slake mine ire, nor ease my heart.

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: The sight of any of the house of York

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Is as a fury to torment my soul;

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: And till I root out their accursed line

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: And leave not one alive, I live in hell.

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Therefore--

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Lifting his hand

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: O, let me pray before I take my death!

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: To thee I pray; sweet Clifford, pity me!

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Such pity as my rapier's point affords.

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: I never did thee harm: why wilt thou slay me?

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Thy father hath.

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: But 'twas ere I was born.

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Thou hast one son; for his sake pity me,

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Lest in revenge thereof, sith God is just,

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: He be as miserably slain as I.

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Ah, let me live in prison all my days;

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: And when I give occasion of offence,

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Then let me die, for now thou hast no cause.

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: No cause!

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Thy father slew my father; therefore, die.

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Stabs him

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Di faciant laudis summa sit ista tuae!

speaker: RUTLAND
text_entry: Dies

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Plantagenet! I come, Plantagenet!

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: And this thy son's blood cleaving to my blade

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Shall rust upon my weapon, till thy blood,

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Congeal'd with this, do make me wipe off both.

speaker: CLIFFORD
text_entry: Exit
